Redirect Checker

üí° Quick Check with curl

curl -LIs "https://example.com" | grep -E "^HTTP|^location"

This tool checks redirect chains by following HTTP redirects. Due to browser security restrictions (CORS), this tool works best with URLs that allow cross-origin requests. For full redirect chain analysis, use command-line tools like curl -LI.
